Name: Authentication
Impact: Immediate domain access, SMB share staging
Remediation: Change password immediately, enforce complexity policy

Name: Authentication
Remediation: Remove password from description, rotate credentials

Name: Kerberos
Remediation: Enable Kerberos Pre-Authentication for all users

Name: Kerberos
Remediation: Rotate service account passwords, implement MSA

Name: Active Directory
Remediation: Remove unconstrained delegation, implement constrained delegation

Name: SMB
Impact: Payload staging, lateral movement, data exfiltration
Remediation: Remove anonymous access, implement proper ACLs

Name: Certificate Services
Remediation: Restrict CertEnroll access, review certificate templates

Name: Database
Impact: Cross-server lateral movement, remote code execution
Remediation: Review link necessity, implement proper authentication

Name: Group Policy
Impact: Domain-wide privilege escalation via scheduled tasks
Remediation: Review and restrict GPO permissions, implement delegation model

Name: Active Directory
Remediation: Review trust relationships, implement SID filtering

Name: Web Application
Impact: Web shell upload, remote code execution
Remediation: Disable file upload capability, implement upload restrictions

Name: Web Application
Remediation: Disable TRACE method in IIS configuration
